design_system.mission: AI-powered growth platform for social media creators
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix SaaS precision with Neon Cyberpunk energy
Content is King: Data must be legible but beautiful
Negative Space: Luxurious spacing to separate heavy data
Contrast: High contrast Neon on Matte Black

colors.description: A deep void black base with electric cyan/teal accents. No muddy greys.

typography.instructions: Import 'Outfit' from Google Fonts. Use 'Outfit' for all headings (h1-h3) and 'Inter' for body text. Ensure headings have tight tracking.

glassmorphism.usage: Use for sticky headers, modal overlays, and floating cards.

button.primary: bg-cyan-500 text-black hover:bg-cyan-400 font-semibold shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(6,182,212,0.4)] transition-all

card.glass: backdrop-blur-md bg-slate-900/40 border border-slate-800/50 rounded-xl p-6

input.default: bg-slate-950/50 border-slate-800 focus:border-cyan-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-cyan-500 rounded-lg text-white placeholder:text-slate-600

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text-slate-400 is not used on very dark backgrounds if size is small. Use text-slate-300 for better contrast.
accessibility.interactive_elements: All buttons and links must have a focus ring (ring-cyan-500/50).

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: 'yarn add @fontsource/outfit @fontsource/inter' if not present, or use Google Fonts CDN.
SETUP: Configure tailwind.config.js to extend colors with the specific cyan/teal palette provided.
LAYOUT: Use 'Bento Grid' layouts for the features section. Avoid simple 3-column grids.
STYLE: Apply 'glassmorphism' classes to the sidebar and top navigation.
INTERACTION: Add 'hover_lift' classes to all cards and primary buttons.
COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn components but override styles to match the 'Dark Tech' aesthetic (remove heavy bright borders, use subtle slate-800 borders).
CHARTS: Use Recharts with the 'chart-1' to 'chart-5' CSS variables mapped to the neon palette.
TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'center-aligned' layouts. Use asymmetry.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use #030712 or #0A0A0A.
Dark mode only - do not implement light mode toggle unless requested.
